name: Anti-Flyer Machinegun, Crewed, Disposable, Prototype (PDaFMgC-12)
description: Prototype of the disposable crewed anti-flyer machinegun. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
